about_the_game:
"Devil Slayer - Raksasi 2" is a top-down, action, role-playing game. The game offers four major professions with over a dozen growth directions, more than one hundred weapons, and a rich array of special abilities. Countless powerful enemies lie ahead, and the shattered world needs you to repair it.

Sequel Declaration

  • "Devil Slayer - Raksasi 2" is the official sequel to "Devil Slayer - Raksasi", developed by the original team, GlassesCatGames. The game's story picks up after "Devil Slayer - Raksasi: Incarnation of Darkness" DLC.

  • The story of "Devil Slayer - Raksasi 2" is complete, and if you haven't played the prequel, it won't affect your enjoyment of this installment.

  • Unlike the prequel, "Devil Slayer - Raksasi 2" is not a Roguelike game, and many of the game systems have been redesigned and created anew, making the gameplay experience significantly different from the predecessor.

Old and New Faces

The Devil Slayer's Guild rescued an amnesiac girl, this [Reborn] who stood up from the pile of the dead, taking up weapons and armor, stepping into the battlefield. She aims to protect those around her and to search for her lost memories.

Four Major Professions

The game initially offers four professions to choose from, each with its own exclusive skill tree and multiple development paths. Profession growth, skill combinations, equipment abilities, and rich combinations provide more variety and greater fun for repeated play.

Swordsman

Wielding a sword to roam the rivers and lakes, slashing demons and evil spirits, if we talk about my way, it is to open the heavenly gate with a single heart.

+ Constitution + Intelligence + Spirit

Preferred Weapons: Swords, Dual Wield

Iron Guard

Copper walls and iron walls are here, what is there to fear from swords, spears, and arrows? I guard the world with my body to protect peace.

++ Constitution + Spirit

Preferred Weapons: Polearms, Shields

Berserker

The flames reflect the mountains and rivers, the drums shake the three armies, waiting for me to break the city and defeat the enemy, leaving no one unscathed.

+ Constitution ++ Strength

Preferred Weapons: Heavy Weapons, Cannons

Hunter

In the dark forest, the grass is startled by the wind, hiding and tracking, I take a hundred steps to wear Yang, plucking stars to order life and death.

++ Strength + Intelligence

Preferred Weapons: Bows, Firearms, Daggers, Chian Weapon

We are working hard to produce and perfect "Devil Slayer - Raksasi 2". If you are interested in this game or wish to participate in testing, welcome to join our player community.

content_descriptors.notes: Ordinary combat includes cartoon violent and bloody content.
